Body: I just started using Android Studio on my Mac and I can't get it to work because of some "Rendering Problems" exception.  Every time I drag a textview, button, or any component in design mode to the screen, these elements become invisible. Even though they appear in the component tree they disappear from the screen or workspace (however that thing is called).I have updated every single Android SDK, I have the latest Java SDK version, I have updated Android Studio, I have reinstalled Studio like 100 times (not kidding), I have switched to all APIS and I still get different rendering errors.
